gameDetails.name: Materia Prima: The Alchemists Seal Expansion
gameDetails.description:
The all-dominant race for the Philosopher‘s Stone causes some alchemists to use dirty tricks. With the expansion, alchemists can block hexes with Seal Stones, occupy element mines, and build a resource monopoly. The Expansion also adds new alchemists, homunculi and equipment cards to the base game.

—description from the designer
